creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Poem:
Spring has come filling the sand road where uncountable waves keep coming to.
(Nami no hana
Tsukisenu hama no
Masagoji ya
Iso nimo mitsuru
Senkin no haru)
by Wacho_tei Suenaga
markings: Drum mark(of Taiko-ren circle) sealed in red
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Shuihuzhuan of Women’s Customs: From 108 Figures (Fūzoku onna Suikoden, ippyakuhachinin no uchi 風俗女水滸伝　壹百八人ノ内)
title: Gen Shogo [Ruan Xiaowu]; Five-sheet print of Collecting Brine, no. 5
